enb_long_title: First Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: An informal working group chaired by Mahmoud Ould El Ghaouth began consultations on joint implementation (JI) Tuesday afternoon.
A drafting group of about 30 delegates began negotiations Tuesday night, working from a paper circulated by the G-77 and the EU and US draft decisions from INC-11.
The drafting group was expected to work late into the night.
